back: metilene is a software tool to annotate differentally methylated regions (DMRs) and differentially methylated CpG sites (DMCs) from Methyl-seq data.

Differentially methylated regions. Regions that exhibit consistently different DNA methylation levels between sample groups (for example, cases versus controls). DMRs can be as small as a single C or as large as an entire gene locus, depending on the biological question of interest
